name: Welcome to Albany Space Cruises
description:
Welcome aboard Albany Space Cruises. 
We will be taking you and your fellow passengers to some of the most exciting holiday planets this side of Alpha Centauri.
What's that?
Where are my fellow passengers? 
They were around "before".

Don't worry about that!
Why not get a souvenir or take a look at the information panel to find out more about the trip.
Why is the door locked?
I'm not sure…
Maybe it was due to the "incident".

Take control of an Investigator Droid as it explores the Earth Ship Albany to find out what happened to everyone on board.

This is the first room of a series to explore. The others are temporally locked in the future at present.
